column4: unity is when a company thinks they could out-develop ppl making DE for decades withing 1-2 years, as such it's a crippled beast and any sane linux user should avoid using it (as most do that anyway)

no as i don't use ubuntu but as it is linux i try to help other ppl using it.. and sry for the long personal opinion on unity
